tool_description: Find BSR (Basic Statistical Return) Codes of all banks in India either through branch address or BSR Code.
name: Bank BSR Codes - India
title: Bank BSR Codes - India

api_list.name: BSR
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bsr.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bsr.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
